name: Vultur - Magic Artifact Retrieval Service
description:
"Powerful relics lost to time, enchanted trinkets with a dark history or haunted amulets tucked away in musem storerooms. There are always those who know about them, and those who obtain them."

 New information regarding a mysterious talisman points to a secluded house deep in the woods.

Looks like a job for Vultur's new hires!  But what seems to be no more than a simple errand may take an  unexpected turn:  will they be able to get out alive?

Find out in this super short game!
